FC-FOOTLOCKER.title: Footlocker Ammo Box
FC-FOOTLOCKER.description: The Freedom Footlocker is our largest handcrafted ammo box, built from durable 1/2-inch plywood to balance strength with reduced weight. Designed with dual removable compartments for organized storage, it offers an impressive interior capacity of 20 1/4" wide × 10" long × 8" deep. Crafted in limited quantities due to the time and material required—available occasionally as stock permits or by custom request.

FC-RB-300.title: Rangemaster 300
FC-RB-300.description:
The Rangemaster 300 is the compact sibling to our Rangemaster 400, purpose-built for pistol calibers. Crafted from durable 1/2-inch ply and finished in Freedom Crate Co.’s signature ultra-flat OD Green.

Features:
  • Black heavy-duty hardware & oversized stainless steel hinges
  • Spring-loaded folding top handle for quick grab-and-go
  • Proprietary 1-inch brown nylon webbing side handles with fail-safe recessed mount system
  • Secure over-center latch keeps the lid tight and ammo secure
  • Divider-ready interior for pistol calibers (.380, 9mm, 10mm, .45 ACP)
Compact, organized, and built to last — the Rangemaster 300 is your go-to pistol-caliber ammo crate.

FC-RM-400.title: Rangemaster 400
FC-RM-400.description: Up to 400 rounds in one compact carry; open–load–shoot–close.

FC-CLASSIC.title: Freedom Crate Classic
FC-CLASSIC.description:
The Freedom Crate Classic is the original design that started it all — a straightforward, rugged slide-top crate built for everyday use. Nearly identical in build quality to our Branch Collection, the Classic keeps things simple with no hinges, no latches, and no stencils — just clean lines and tough construction at a great value.

The Freedom Crate Classic is essentially the Freedom Crate Classic Branch Collection without the stencils, hinges, or latches. If you’re looking for a version with those upgrades, scroll up to the Branch Collection. And if you don’t see what you’re after there, feel free to submit a custom order — we’ll see what we can do.

Features:
  • Handcrafted from solid pine boards for durability and strength
  • Smooth slide-top lid for quick access — no hinges or latches needed
  • 1-inch black nylon webbing side handles for reliable carry
  • Clean exterior (no stencils) for a timeless, versatile look
  • Spacious interior for gear, ammo, or storage essentials
  • Lightweight yet tough — built to last, built for function
Simple, strong, and true to the roots of Freedom Crate Co., the Classic is a must-have for anyone looking for quality at a great price.
